Package game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
game.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player entity is used both for the player as well as enemy teams you fight against. It contains a name, the players current gold and score, the player's team and inventory and the currently active monster. It also contains behaviour for using items, making random moves for enemies, changing the currently active monster, pre and post battle behaviour as well as rewarding the player post battle and refreshing the player's team.

      gold - int. The player's initial gold.

      monster - Monster. The Monster the item should be used on.

    • setActiveMonsterIndex

      public void setActiveMonsterIndex(int index)
      Sets the active monster index and marks that monster as active during battle, as such this should be used even within the Player class instead of setting activeMonsterIndex directly.
      Parameters:
      index - int. The new index of the active monster.

    • getSwitchableMonsters

      public ArrayList<Monster> getSwitchableMonsters()
      Filters the monsters in the team to return the ones which are awake and aren't the currently active monster.
      Returns:
      ArrayList. The monsters in the team which may be switched to.

    • checkIfActiveMonster

      public boolean checkIfActiveMonster()
      A function to check whether the team can still fight and set the active monster variable to the first awake monster if the current active monster is fainted.
      Returns:
      boolean. True if there is at least one monster in the team still able to fight.

    • preTurnLogic

      public ArrayList<String> preTurnLogic()
      Runs preTurnLogic() for each monster in the team, and returns all the messages from the calls. (for status effects and stuff).
      Returns:
      ArrayList. A list of messages describing any actions taken pre turn, for displaying to the player.

    • preBattle

      public void preBattle()
      Initializes each monster to not active during battle before the battle starts, so those which are active are rewarded apporopriately post battle.

    • postBattle

      public void postBattle()
      Gets rid of any left over status effects on any of the monsters in the team post battle.

    • rewardPostBattle

      public void rewardPostBattle(int day, int diff, boolean wasWildBattle)
      Rewards each monster in the team with xp, and rewards the player with an increased score, and if the battle was not a wild battle, also rewards the player with gold.
      Parameters:
      day - int. The current day.
      diff - int. The difficulty.
      wasWildBattle - boolean. Whether or not the battle was a wild battle.

    • makeRandomMove

      public String makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
      Randomly decides which move to make, If an item may be used, there is a 1/5 chance an item will be used. There is a 1/15 chance the currently active monster is swapped out. If neither of these actions take place then the currently active monster will make a random attack against the enemy using Monster.makeRandomMove(enemy).
      Parameters:
      enemy - Monster. The enemy monster, to make the move against if an attack is chosen.
      Returns:
      String. A description of the move made.

    • refreshTeam

      public void refreshTeam()
      Full reset of the team's status (set health to full and remove status effects, etc.).

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the player, listing the name, gold, score and team size.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
